title: French Pullout From Niger May Jeopardize US Security Footprint in Western Africa
description: A soldier of the Barkhane force holds a weapon in an helicopter as he flies near Ouallam's military base, on July 15, 2022, during an official visit of French Ministers of Foreign Affairs and Armed Forces to Niger. - The French Ministers of Foreign Affairs and Armed Forces affirmed on July 15, 2022 in Niamey their willingness to deepen the key partnership of Paris with Niger on the economic and military levels, at a time when France seeks to redefine its strategic offer in Africa. (Photo by BERTRAND GUAY / AFP) (Photo by BERTRAND GUAY/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Waterloo Passes Bylaw Banning Communication That Makes People ‘Feel Harassed’ on Region Property
description: Protesters hold signs in front of counter-protestors at a demonstration against sexual orientation and gender identity programs in schools, in front of Parliament Hill in Ottawa on Sept. 20, 2023. The protest was one of many across Canada, organized by "1MillionMarch4Children," as they protest against "gender ideology" being taught in schools. (Patrick Doyle/The Canadian Press)
